projects.title: Stackbox
projects.description: A Docker based developer productivity tool to setup project infra and boilerplates instantly

projects.title: Journal AR
projects.description: An AR app for people looking to take care of their mental health through active journaling. Built at the MIT Reality Hack 2020.

projects.title: AR Magazine
projects.description: Built an AR experience for Intuit India's magazine content using Unity. The app extends physical magazine content virtually.

projects.title: Proximity Marketing
projects.description: BLE Beacons enabled proximity sensing and RFM powered product recommendations to enhance customer experience for brick and mortar Stores
